video_prompt: Shifting lion head, subtle facial expressions, and undulating mane within a pop-art style. The background subtly pulses, hinting at painted brushstrokes.
image_prompt: Vibrant pop art digital painting of a lion's head in profile, facing right, against a deep red background. The lion features bold, distinct brushstrokes with a palette of browns, gold, creams, and unexpected purplish-red and blue accents. Focus on the alert golden-orange eyes, textured muzzle with white whiskers and creamy under-mouth, and an expressive mane with visible, short brushstrokes in golden-browns, light brown, dark blue, and red creating movement. Include a white "c2g" signature in the bottom right corner with visible brushstrokes on the red background. Modern artistic interpretation emphasizing strength and majesty.
refined_video_prompt: A lion's head subtly shifts, its facial expressions gently transforming. The mane undulates with fluid motion, while bold, high-contrast color shifts dynamically ripple across its form. The background continuously pulses, its textured brushstrokes appearing, dissolving, and re-forming.
